name: JetStreamers
description:
Overview

JetStreamers is a twin-stick top-down game unlike no other. You must control two ships at the same time - one red and one blue. Each ship can only travel in nebula of their same color. Careful though. Fly a ship in the opposing colored nebula and you will spin out of control!

Both ships emit a colored wake or 'stream' behind them. This stream allows the opposite colored ship to pass safely through the wrong colored nebula. However, each ship's stream does not last forever! Collect fuel canisters scattered across the level to keep the wakes flowing.

Controls Keyboard/Mouse
  • WASD:  move red ship
  • Arrow Keys:   move blue ship
  • M  Key:  pause game
  • Mouse:  select menu items
Controller
  • Left Stick:  move red ship
  • Right stick:  move blue ship
  • Left Face Button:  pause game
  • A button:  Select item
Notes
  • It is recommended that you play this game with a controller, although the game is still playable with the keyboard.
  • JetStreamers is only available for windows 64 bit machines
Credits Team
  • Joshua Rosen
  • Marcus Romriell
  • Lex Dath
  • Ryan Dougherty
Organizations
  • University of Utah EAE Program
Software
  • Made using Unreal Engine 4
